home.name: Bharath Gajjala
home.title: Software Engineer
home.introduction:
I am software engineer with a primary focus on exploring the intricacies of distributed computing with interests in data systems. Hi, I’m Bharath Gajjala. I’m a software engineer focused on distributed systems and building scalable, reliable solutions at the enterprise level. I enjoy solving complex problems that directly affect our quality of life as humans.

Based in the SF Bay Area, I write about engineering, system design, and the lessons I’ve learned along the way. I’d love to meet for coffee, exchange ideas, and make new friends—feel free to reach out!
